text: Ochrosia haleakalae, the island yellowwood or hōlei, is a species of plant in the family Apocynaceae that is endemic to Hawaii. It is threatened by habitat loss. Nuts of Ochrosia haleakalae ==References== Category:Endemic flora of Hawaii Category:Trees of Hawaii haleakalae Category:Endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Ochrosia haleakalae
